title: Worked Solution
text:
To solve this equation, we need to isolate the variable $$x$$ on one side of the equation. To do this, we can add $$34$$ to both sides of the equation:
$$x+16+34=-34+34$$
Combining like terms, we get:
$$x+50=0$$
Then, we can subtract $$50$$ from both sides of the equation to isolate the variable x:
$$x+50-50=0-50$$
$$x=-50$$
Therefore, the solution to the equation is $$x=-50$$.
